class.name: IKBoneSegment3D
class.brief_description: A class representing a 3D bone segment in an Inverse Kinematics system.
class.description: The IKBoneSegment3D class represents a 3D bone segment in an Inverse Kinematics (IK) system. It provides methods to get the IK bone associated with the segment and check if the segment is pinned.

method.name: get_ik_bone
method.description: Returns the IKBone3D object associated with the given bone index.

method.name: is_pinned
method.description: Returns true if the bone segment is pinned, false otherwise.
